about_the_game:
🔥 An Epic Galactic Conflict

The galaxy of Zoratharion is on the brink of collapse. Hostile forces have conquered entire systems, turning once-thriving planets into war zones.
You are an audacious pilot, the last hope against this rising threat.
Aboard your futuristic ship, your mission is to liberate each system’s planets by facing relentless enemies and formidable bosses.
Every world hides secrets, and only your determination can restore peace to the galaxy.

🚀 Zoratharion: A Galactic Roguelite Shoot 'em Up!

Zoratharion is an action-packed game with roguelite elements, set in a dynamic sci-fi universe.
Choose your pilot, ship, and weapon, then set out to save the galaxy!
Each victory empowers your build through an upgrade and bonus system.
Optimize your choices to push further and conquer the most dangerous corners of the Zoratharion galaxy.

🎮 Fast-Paced and Addictive Roguelite Mechanics

  • 🚀 Choose your style in Zoratharion: Select a configuration from several pilots, ships and weapons, each with its own unique powers and abilities. Up to 64 different combinations for increased replayability!

  • ✊ Frenetic action: Survive waves of enemies in procedurally generated environments.

  • ✨ Strategic upgrades: After each victory, use your winnings to buy upgrades, strengthen your arsenal and customise your build.

  • 💥 Permanent Death: Each defeat makes you start again from scratch, but with the experience gained to go further.

  • 👌 Unique challenges: Face impressive bosses, discover rare bonuses and adapt your strategy to each game.

  • ⭐ A dynamic SF universe filled with planets to liberate and mysteries to discover.

Every session offers a fresh challenge, blending reflexes, strategy, and quick thinking. Will you rise to become the legendary savior of the Zoratharion galaxy?

ABOUT:

Zoratharion is a personal project on which I've been working passionately for several months. My goals are simple:

  • To create a fun game that players can enjoy,

  • Learn about game development,

  • Build a unique universe,

  • Share my adventure of publishing a game on Steam.

Developed entirely in Python using Pygame, this SF action game is an attempt to explore game development (at my level) and what it is possible to do with Python.
As a solo developer, every step of the way - from programming, gameplay mechanics, visuals and soundscape to publishing and promotion - has been a new and great learning experience for me.
Thank you for taking the time to discover Zoratharion. Your support means a lot! Thanks also to everyone who has helped me on this adventure.

Add Zoratharion to your wishlist on Steam and get ready for interstellar combat!
